```{r, echo = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
```

# Page 1

## Row 1

```{r, warning - FALSE}
p1 <- ggplot(starwars, aes(x = mass, y = height, text = name)) + 
  geom_point()

ggplotly(p1)
```

## Row 2 {,tabset}

```{r}
#| title: Bar Chart 
 
p2 <-ggplot(starwars, aes(x = name, y = height)) + 
  geom_bar(stat = 'identity') + 
  theme(axis.title.x = element_text(angle = 45, vjust = .5, hjust = 2))
ggplotly(p2)
```

```{r}
#| title: Table

starwars <- starwars %>% 
  select(name, height, mass, gender, homeworld, species)

knitr::kable(starwars)
```
